Description: Absolute path to the watermark image
Possible Values: Note that this MUST be the absolute path to the weatermark image. If placed in the 'app' directory, use pre-existing macros set in global.conf, such as <ca_app_dir>, to avoid hardcoding in path info. Eg. if you have the watermark image at /web/ca/app/watermarks/mymark.png you can configure it here as <ca_app_dir>/watermarks/mymark.png
